gt table theme

Source: R/tables.R
NBA_tbl_theme.Rd

Function to apply gt styling to table

Usage

nba_tbl_theme(
  GT_TBL,
  HEADER = c("sanbi-green", "sanbi-orange", "sanbi-purple", "Freshwater", "Marine",
    "Coast", "Estuarine", "Terrestrial", "Genetics", "PEI")
)

Arguments

GT_TBL

The data frame that contains the data

HEADER

the name to determine the colour of the header row. Defaults to SANBI green

Examples

library(gt)
library(dplyr)


gt_tbl <- NBA_example_thr_data %>%
 gt() %>%
nba_tbl_theme()

gt_tbl
